backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with contact form submission, contact retrieval, and user profile management, all protected by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (LanguageContext, translations file, language switcher integration) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for each frontend source file, describing the content and functionality of pages and components in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes, covering colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'Agro Crops', mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with auth-guarded routes, a global CartContext provider, and wraps the app with LanguageProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Reusable wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger CSS animations (fadeIn, slideUp, zoomIn, slideInLeft, slideInRight) when the section scrolls into view.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying brand info, translated quick-nav links, and real contact details (email, phone, location) as clickable links, with a copyright line and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with desktop/mobile navigation, a cart sheet with checkout flow (cart → customer details → success), and logout functionality using session storage for auth state.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Renders a row of buttons to switch between English, Hindi, and Marathi languages using the LanguageContext.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart and wishlist state with add, remove, update quantity, clear, and wishlist toggle operations, plus derived totals.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context that manages the active language (en/hi/mr), persists it to localStorage, and exposes a translation lookup function with English fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and expose identity and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a useSubmitContact mutation hook that calls the backend actor's submitContact method and invalidates the contacts query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Poppins and Merriweather fonts, defining a green-themed OKLCH CSS variable palette with dark mode, and declaring reusable animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero section, stats grid, mission/vision cards, and team member profiles using i18n translations via useLanguage context.
frontend/src/pages/Cattle.tsx: Displays an organic livestock guide page with searchable/expandable animal cards (cow, buffalo, goat, sheep, poultry) covering breed, food, care, and farming details, plus a benefits section.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders a contact page with a validated form (name, email, message) that submits via a React Query mutation, alongside static contact info (email, phone, address).
frontend/src/pages/Equipment.tsx: Displays a filterable, searchable catalog of farm equipment items with detailed specs, usage info, and embedded YouTube tutorial links, organized by category.
frontend/src/pages/Farm.tsx: Shows a searchable crop guide table listing crops with season, soil type, benefits, and tips, plus a section highlighting organic farming benefits, with i18n support.
frontend/src/pages/GovernmentSchemes.tsx: Displays a list of Indian government agricultural schemes (PM-KISAN, PMFBY, KCC, NMSA, SHC, etc.) with details on benefits and eligibility, rendered using AnimatedSection and Lucide icons.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: The landing page showcasing a hero section, organic farming benefits, region-wise crops, government scheme highlights, and future scope items, using i18n translations and React Router links.
frontend/src/pages/OtpVerification.tsx: A 4-digit OTP verification page that validates a demo OTP ('1234'), manages digit-by-digit input with refs, and sets session authentication before redirecting to home.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: An e-commerce shop page listing organic products (seeds, vegetables, fertilizers) with search and category filtering, supporting add-to-cart functionality with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: A signup page that collects a 10-digit Indian mobile number, validates it, stores it in sessionStorage, and navigates to the OTP verification page.
frontend/src/pages/Techniques.tsx: Displays a grid of nine organic farming techniques (composting, crop rotation, drip irrigation, etc.) with icons and i18n-translated descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Defines a multilingual translations object (English, Hindi, Marathi) covering all UI strings across navigation, pages, and features of the Agro Crops application.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with a custom green/brown color palette using OKLCH variables, custom fonts, border radii, box shadows, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 19) for the Agro Crops organic farming website, documenting architectural notes, known issues, and a list of all implemented features with their requirement IDs.
